seo.title: Edit Environmental Complaint | P7CO® EcoResupply
header.title: Edit Environmental Complaint
header.only_owner: You can only edit your own complaints.
header.you_can_update: You can update the description, location and attach new images.
field.title.label: Title
field.title.placeholder: E.g.: Illegal waste dumping in protected area
field.entity.label: Entity Name (optional)
field.category.label: Category
field.images.label: Images (max. 6 total)
field.images.help: The first image is the cover. Drag (existing and new) to reorder.
field.description.label: Description
field.description.placeholder: Describe what happened: type of infraction, exact location, date/time, people involved, risks…
field.map.label: Select location on the map
alert.only_you_edit: Only you (signed-in user) can edit this complaint.
